page.title: 01General View.
page.content:
In our block we have half a village called{Tibberton,}a village called{Cherrrington}and a few other groups of houses. The{River Strine}is at the south end of our block and the {River Meese}at the north end of the block.
The{main road}is in the middle of the block because it is drier. The main {crops}are sugarbeet,barley,and potatoes.
The{cattle,}mostly Friesian, are mainly at the North and South of the block by the rivers.
People{work}on the farms, or are employed in the nearby towns.The main town for people at the East end is {Newport.}People at the other end use {Wellington.}
